amendment.description: Amendment adds additional text to the preamble of the resolution.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add new material to the preamble of the resolution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Royce.
